sources.name: SQLProducts
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> SQLProducts

sources.name: ProdFromSales
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWhash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> ProdFromSales

transformations.name: Exists1
transformations.script:
CreateDWHash, Filter2 exists(CreateDWHash@DWHash == ProdFromSales@DWhash,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
